markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stage Fighting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6336) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Gladiator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=251)

**Prerequisites**
[Gladiator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6333)

</column>

---

You pull punches to give a better show. You don't take the usual –2 circumstance penalty when making a [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661) attack with a weapon or unarmed attack that doesn't have the nonlethal trait.
name: Stage Fighting
